wf.name: Wolf
wf.desc: A relentless assassin aiming to wipe out either all villagers or all gods (or both). They can kill other players (including other wolves) during night time.

wk.name: Wolf King
wk.desc: A wolf, but with the additional special ability to kill another player when it is killed (witch's poison deactivates this ability).

vl.name: Villager
vl.desc: A villager is a player with no special abilities. They can only vote who to kill during day time.

wc.name: Witch
wc.desc: The witch has the abilities of reviving the dead and poisoning other players. Each ability can only be used once, and can only be uesd during night time.

se.name: Seer
se.desc: That person with the ability to see through other people's mind and reveal their true identiy.

id.name: Idiot
id.desc: A god? Or a villager? Or both? You can only tell when you vote the idiot out.

ht.name: Hunter
ht.desc: Saves the villagers and gods with the ability to kill a player upon death. *Your sacrifice will be remembered.*
